channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senate set to pass internet safety bill pushed by parents of kids who died by suicide
item.description: It would be the first major effort by Congress in decades to hold tech companies more accountable for the harm that they cause.

item.title: Merck beats earnings expectations, raises sales outlook on strong demand for top drugs like Keytruda
item.description: The drugmaker raised its full-year sales forecast to $63.4 billion to $64.4 billion on increased demand for key products, particularly oncology treatments.

item.title: Historic changes are coming to home buying in August. Here’s what to know.
California man fights state’s largest wildfire to within 70 feet of his house one month after insurance company drops his coverage
item.description: Ron Ward had lost insurance coverage as companies increasingly drop California homeowners due to the growing risk of wildfires in the state, in part due to hotter weather and arid conditions caused by climate change.

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Buy the Netflix dip, chip stock gets an upgrade
item.description: A semiconductor stock and a streaming giant were among the names being talked about by analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Cannabis company Tilray placed a huge bet on craft beers. It's paying off.
White House says there’s no need to restrict ‘open source’ AI—for now at least
item.description: “We recognize the importance of open systems," said Alan Davidson, an assistant secretary of the U.S. Commerce Department.

item.title: Euro zone's economy grew 0.3% in second quarter, above expectations despite German contraction
item.description: The euro zone's economy grew by more than expected in the second quarter of 2024, flash figures from the European Union's statistics office showed Tuesday.

item.title: How Tesla stock became a ‘Trump trade’ despite GOP climate skepticism
Trump says he ‘can also make a case for not’ debating Kamala Harris
item.description: Trump, in an interview with Fox News Channel that aired Monday night, was pressed several times about committing to debating Harris before giving a squishier answer than he had in recent days.

item.title: Johnnie Walker-maker Diageo plunges 10% on full-year sales decline, but Guinness a bright spot
item.description: Shares of spirits giant Diageo tumbled on Tuesday morning, after the Johnnie Walker-maker posted its first sales decline since the start of the pandemic.

item.title: U.S. stocks end mixed ahead of Fed decision, jobs data, more earnings
Johnnie Walker maker Diageo sees first sales drop since the pandemic—but Guinness and ready-made cocktails save the day
item.description: Diageo’s CEO Debra Crew said that despite pockets of weakness, the “merit of our portfolio is that we really do have very broad options for the consumer.”

item.title: Protests erupt in Venezuela after Maduro claims victory in disputed election result
item.description: Thousands of protesters took to the streets of Caracas on Monday to repudiate Maduro's claim of clinching a third six-year term in power.

item.title: IPO market’s $23.2 billion in year-to-date proceeds exceeds total raised in 2023
